entries.journal_entry_description: Captain Bastra has given you a chance to prove yourself. The cargo was broken up into three lots. One sold to some Jawa traders in a Sand Crawler. The second sold to the Valarian crime ring, and the last sold to the Darklighter clan. You need to go and get a complete inventory of what each of those groups purchased so Bastra can figure out the connection between the cargo and this mystical powerful Jedi.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You need to get a complete inventory of what the Jawas, Valarians and Darklighters bought from that shipment that you helped get off of the space station.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Good to see that you have gotten the complete inventory. You need it get it to my slicer. Problem is he decided to do some free lance work for some criminals and now they will not let him go. You need get to him, using any means necessary.
